overview_description.description:
NGEN is a Managed Service Provider with over 25 years of experience in the Washington metropolitan area. They provide customized, affordable solutions to meet your IT needs.
NGEN takes a hands-on approach to keeping your systems stable and secure by providing quick, friendly, and professional service. By specializing in IT Management, Cybersecurity, Network Design and Strategic Planning, and Cloud Services, NGEN is the perfect partner to help your business or agency reach its full potential.NGEN combines fieldwork from their  talented network engineers with oversight from senior-level consultants to deliver customized solutions to their  clients. By sharing expertise from both sides of their company, NGEN serves as architect and builder of total-picture systems that are molded to your specific needs.
